programme.title: Best of Monster Jam
programme.desc: Catch all of the non-stop action in this epic-sized compilation of 2024's best freestyle runs!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: 45,000+ are on-hand for Stadium Championship Series Blue in the home of the Dallas Cowboys, AT&T Stadium. Drivers and trucks include: Ryan Anderson in Son-uva Digger, Bari Musawwir in Zombie, Cynthia Gauthier in Lucas Stabilizer, Tyler Menninga in Grave Digger, Cory Rummell in Megalodon, Jim Koehler in Avenger, John Gordon in Bad Company, Ryan Disharoon in Shaker, Charlie Pauken in El Toro Loco, Joe Foley in Axe, Chris Koehler in Monster Mutt, and Colt Stephens in ThunderROARus.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: Mercedes-Benz Superdome - New Orleans, LA - Freestyle
programme.desc: Monster Jam's 2012 season continues at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome, on January 28, 2012, with exciting freestyle fun!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam returns to Oracle Park in San Francisco as Bari Musawwir looks to lead Zombie to back-to-back event wins. Can Kayla Blood recover from electrical issues that plagued Solider Fortune’s Series debut? Will inconsistencies continue to drive the Anderson Brothers out of the top spot? It’s round 3, it’s Monster Jam Stadium Championship Series West.

programme.title: World Finals
programme.sub-title: World Finals XIV - Sam Boyd Stadium - Las Vegas, NV - Freestyle 1
programme.desc: First half of freestyle action from Monster Jam World Finals XIV on March 23, 2013.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: Sun Bowl Stadium - El Paso, TX
programme.desc: Sun Bowl Stadium in El Paso, TX is ground zero for Monster Jam action.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam's 2020 season continues with racing and freestyle action at the AT&T Stadium on February 29, 2020.

programme.title: Primetime
programme.desc: Monster Jam Primetime visits Glendale, AZ for Round 11 of Stadium Championship East.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam's 2009 season kicks off with exciting racing action from the HHH Metrodome on December 6, 2008.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam fans packed out the HHH Metrodome for the freestyle action on December 3, 2005.

programme.title: World Finals
programme.sub-title: World finals XXI - Camping World Stadium - Orlando, FL
programme.desc: The Monster Jam series closes out with the world finals XXI at Camping World Stadium in Orlando, Florida on May 21–22, 2022.

programme.title: World Finals
programme.sub-title: World Finals XX - Camping World Stadium - Orlando, FL - Speedsters
programme.desc: The Monster Jam Speedsters hit the track for the first Obstacle Course Challenge of the weekend during Monster Jam World Finals XX (20), direct from Camping World Stadium in Orlando, Florida.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Don't miss all the epic freestyle action from the Florida Citrus Bowl, on January 28, 2006.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Day 3 of the Monster Jam 2021 Stadium Championship Series continues at Camping World Stadium, in Orlando, FL.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Buckle in for Monster Jam freestyle fun at the Astrodome in Houston, Texas.

programme.title: Arena in 25
programme.desc: Monster Jam's Arena Series in 25 continues with round 18 at Gas South Arena in Duluth GA

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam’s 2020 season continues in the Dunkin Donuts Center in Providence, RI.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Catch the epic freestyle action from Gillette Stadium on June 25, 2016.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam goes next level with ATV's, Speedsters and freestyle in day one at the Amalie Arena in Tampa.

programme.title: World Finals
programme.sub-title: World Finals 1 - Sam Boyd Stadium - Las Vegas, NV - 2000 - Part 1
programme.desc: Don't miss the first ever Monster Jam World Finals from Sam Boyd Stadium in Las Vegas, NV.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: At the Sprint Center on January 18, 2020, Monster Jam's 2020 season heats up with triple threat action!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series East continues its tear through the sunshine state as Tyler Menninga attempts to drive Grave Digger to back-to-back event championships. Meanwhile, Tristan England is undefeated on the Ray-J racetrack and looks to pilot JCB Digatron to a perfect racing record as Monster Jam continues in Tampa.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series East ends its Florida run on a mud filled track in Jacksonville. Tyler Menninga looks to mudslide the momentum from a perfect event in Orlando while Blake Granger rides his International Series success back home in the states as he pilots Max-D.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series East slip-slides its way into Gillette Stadium as Bryce Kenny looks to launch Great Clips Mohawk Warrior to back-to-back freestyle wins, as Grave Digger’s Tyler Menninga hopes his competitors don’t rain on his parade to a sixth series title.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series East rolls into upstate New York as Tyler Menninga attempts to clinch his second straight series title, while JCB Digatron’s Tristan England and Megalodon’s Todd LeDuc attempt to block Grave Digger from the series win.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: The fun continues in Miami, FL as your favorite Monster Jam trucks and drivers show off their motor skills at loanDepot Park.

programme.title: Arena in 30
programme.desc: Velociraptor’s David Olfert looks for a hometown win as Arena Championship Series West takes over the Moda Center. Earth Shaker’s Tristan England attempts to hold off Elvis Lainez from taking over the series points lead, while Megalodon’s Ashley Sanford tries to stake her claim as a Rookie of the Year candidate.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: High-octane Monster Jam action in Seattle, Washington.
